message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it has tremendous potential and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, $950000 is a bit higher than I'm currently willing to pay. I'm happy to make a counteroffer of $850000. This reflects the value I see in the product, and I believe it's a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I believe it's a good compromise.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $900000 is closer to what I'm looking for, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go to $875000.  This is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $875000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $925000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to continue negotiating.  $925000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.  I'm offering $890000.  This reflects the value I see in the product and is a price I believe we can both agree on. Let's work together to finalize this deal.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $890000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $915000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product. I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I understand you're getting closer to your minimum, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  However, I'm still not quite there. I'm offering $900000 as my final counteroffer.  This price is fair, reflects the value of the product to both of us, and is the best I can do.  I hope we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $900000. I've already compromised significantly, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $920000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
